item.title: Tesla Stock Was Up, Until Investors Saw This.
item.description: Chinese EV rival Li Auto lowered its forecast for deliveries for the first quarter. It matters because China is a key market for Tesla.
item.content:encoded: Chinese EV rival Li Auto lowered its forecast for deliveries for the first quarter. It matters because China is a key market for Tesla.

item.title: Apple, Micron, Reddit, Astera, Guess, Five Below, Accenture, and More Stock Market Movers
item.description: The Department of Justice sues Apple, alleging the tech giant operates a monopoly over the mobile phone market, Micron posts a surprise quarterly profit, and Reddit soars in trading debut.
item.content:encoded: The Department of Justice sues Apple, alleging the tech giant operates a monopoly over the mobile phone market, Micron posts a surprise quarterly profit, and Reddit soars in trading debut.
